data.message:
I would be forever indebted to you capital if I could go to the Jingle bell ball on Sunday 10th December! ! I have been trying to buy tickets for the last 10 years and that is no exaggeration! 
This year I was in the queue and got to 52nd in line only to be told it was sold out 😭 I don't normally get that far and I almost smashed my laptop out of disappointment 😂 I've even tried winning on air, spent a ton on credit to play!
Why do I want to go? I've only been waiting a decade to no avail!
This year's line up is absolutely immense and I would love love love to be there ♡ I have never been to a 'concert' in my life 😢 this and the summer time ball are the only ones I've been interested in and I've never had the chance :( 
I'm not going to go on with my sob story (there's more 😂) but this would be a dream come true! Genuinely.
I had planned to go with my bestest Dany Bolton and it folded at the last moment. 
You say it sold out in record timing, 45 mins. I was online before 8 am and in line until 8:06am when the page closed and said it had sold out 😭 
I am obsessed with Ed sheeran,  Taylor Swift and the script. So Ofcourse the 10th would be my first pick, but I Saturday will be massive too! Omg I need in! 🎶
#capitalJBB #holidaysarecoming #cocacola #obsessed #ineedthisinmylife
#JBBvirgin #letmein #please #prettyplease #capitalofficial

replies.message: Come on Coca-Cola - please make it happen!!!
Yes #cocacola pleaseeee please pretty please with a cherry on top 🍒❤
Hope u get it Yasmin 👌 u won me over 😂
Dillon Graham hahaha thankyou! 😉😜 as you can see I've been waiting some time to go 😂👍
